Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted hoe and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar(worn) and a plinth beneath the foot.
Condition: fair - glaze worn, cracked at thigh level
